about_the_game:
Become a Memoridian

Special knights and explorers that study and fight against the dangerous creatures called Memories. These are dangerous creatures that one day started showing up one by one. Uncover the truth about their origin while protecting your town.

Upgrade Your Arsenal

Defeat the dangerous Memories and get materials to upgrade your weapon and armor. 

Fighting Style

Choose, test, and play around with the weapon of your choice. Find out what fighting style fits your needs. Slow weapon but huge damage? Speedy weapon but deal small damage over time? Or maybe you want to find a balance between the two? The choice is yours!

Explore The World

When you go on a quest, you won't have a time limit. You can explore and gather materials as you see fit. Find secrets and treasure around the world.

More Stories

Pick and choose from your fellow Memoridians and help them with tasks and missions. You can choose from doing quests from the questboard or joining your peers and complete their stories.

Better With Friends

Invite or join your friends in this adventure. Fight the Memories together and team up to protect your town.
